email-template.name: demo-template
email-template.value:
Hi {{name}},

{{message}}

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards

You are receiving this email from smartcourtkollam

email-template.name: E-Filing Confirmation
email-template.value:
Hello,

The court fees payment for your case {{efilingNumber}} is pending. The case will be filed after the payment is recorded.

Smart Court Kollam

This is an automated message. Please do not reply.

email-template.name: e-sign pending
email-template.value:
Hello,

The eSignature for your case (Efiling number {{efilingnumber}}) is pending. The case will be filed after the eSignature is recorded.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: eSignature Pending Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

The eSignature for your case (CASE ID {{caseId}}) is pending. The case will be filed after the eSignature is recorded.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Case Ready for Submission Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

Your case {{efilingnumber}} is ready for submission. Visit this link to make the case fee payment and to view the complaint.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Payment Complete and Case Filed Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

Your payment for case {{efilingnumber}} is complete. The case is filed and under scrutiny. Visit this link to view case updates.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Scrutiny Complete and Case Registered Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

Scrutiny for case {{efilingnumber}} is complete. The case is registered with {{cnrnumber}}. Visit this link to view case updates.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Errors Identified in Case Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

Errors have been identified in your case {{efilingnumber}} submitted. To rectify the errors, visit this link and resubmit the e-file.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Hearing Scheduled Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

The hearing for case {{cnr}} is scheduled on {{date}} for taking cognizance. Please be on time.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Errors Identified in Case File Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

Errors have been identified in your case file {{cnr}}. To rectify the errors, visit this link and resubmit the e-file.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Next Hearing Scheduled Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

The next hearing for case {{cnr}} is scheduled on {{date}}. Please be on time.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Case Admitted Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

Your case {{efilingnumber}} has been admitted. Please click the link for further details and instructions.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Aadhaar OTP Verification Template
email-template.value:

Your OTP for Aadhaar verification is {{otpCode}}. Do not share this code with anyone.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.value:
Hello,

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Hearing Scheduled with Purpose Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

The hearing for case {{cnr}} is scheduled on {{date}} for {{purpose}}. Please be on time.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Hearing Rescheduled Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

The hearing for case {{cnr}} on {{originalDate}} has been rescheduled to {{date}}. Please be on time for the hearing.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Hearing Reschedule Request Accepted Template
email-template.value:
Hello,

Request to reschedule hearing for case {{cnr}} has been accepted. Please mark unavailable dates for hearing here.

Smart Court Kollam

email-template.name: Hearing Rescheduled Due to Opposing Party Request Template
